ds2.1.2:1.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:2.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṁ hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṁ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṁ hoti, vīriyindriyaṁ hoti, satindriyaṁ hoti, samādhindriyaṁ hoti, paññindriyaṁ hoti, manindriyaṁ hoti, somanassindriyaṁ hoti, jīvitindriyaṁ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.2:2.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:3.1: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, tivaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.2:3.2: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:4.2: Phasso cetanā pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.2:4.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.2:5.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti, yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti—“upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṁ hoti, sukhaṁ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṁ hoti, vīriyindriyaṁ hoti, satindriyaṁ hoti, samādhindriyaṁ hoti, paññindriyaṁ hoti, manindriyaṁ hoti, somanassindriyaṁ hoti, jīvitindriyaṁ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.2:5.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:6.1: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, duvaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.2:6.2: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:7.2: Phasso cetanā cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.2:7.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.2:8.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṁ hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṁ hoti, vīriyindriyaṁ hoti, satindriyaṁ hoti, samādhindriyaṁ hoti, paññindriyaṁ hoti, manindriyaṁ hoti upekkhindriyaṁ hoti, jīvitindriyaṁ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.2:8.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:9.1: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, duvaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.2:9.2: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:10.2: Phasso cetanā cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.2:10.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.2:11.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṁ—
ds2.1.2:11.3: tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:12.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti avitakkaṁ vicāramattaṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṁ hoti, vicāro hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṁ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṁ hoti, vīriyindriyaṁ hoti, satindriyaṁ hoti, samādhindriyaṁ hoti, paññindriyaṁ hoti, manindriyaṁ hoti, somanassindriyaṁ hoti, jīvitindriyaṁ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.2:12.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:13.1: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, caturaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.2:13.2: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:14.2: Phasso cetanā vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.2:14.3: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṁ—
ds2.1.2:15.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṁ hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṁ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṁ hoti, vīriyindriyaṁ hoti, satindriyaṁ hoti, samādhindriyaṁ hoti, paññindriyaṁ hoti, manindriyaṁ hoti, somanassindriyaṁ hoti, jīvitindriyaṁ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:16.1: Tasmiṁ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, aṭṭhindriyāni honti, tivaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, satta balāni honti, tayo hetū honti, eko phasso hoti …pe… ekaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.2:16.2: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.2:17.2: Phasso cetanā pīti cittassekaggatā saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ sammādiṭṭhi sammāvāyāmo …pe… paggāho avikkhepo;

ds2.1.2:21.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sukhassa ca pahānā …pe…
ds2.1.2:21.3: pañcamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṁ hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṁ hoti, vīriyindriyaṁ hoti, satindriyaṁ hoti, samādhindriyaṁ hoti, paññindriyaṁ hoti, manindriyaṁ hoti, upekkhindriyaṁ hoti, jīvitindriyaṁ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti …pe… paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;

ds2.1.2:89.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati sukhapaṭipadaṁ khippābhiññaṁ parittaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:91.13: sukhapaṭipadaṁ khippābhiññaṁ appamāṇaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:92.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:93.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
ds2.1.2:93.6: pañcamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:94.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:95.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni …pe…
ds2.1.2:95.4: odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni, tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmīti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…

ds2.1.2:97.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:98.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti subhanti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:99.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:100.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:101.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā …pe…
ds2.1.2:101.3: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:102.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:103.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti avitakkaṁ vicāramattaṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:104.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:105.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati mettāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:106.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:107.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
ds2.1.2:107.5: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati karuṇāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:108.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:109.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
ds2.1.2:109.5: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati muditāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:110.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:111.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati uddhumātakasaññāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.2:112.2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati vinīlakasaññāsahagataṁ …pe…
